original_text:
I had said in my alarm,
    “I am cut off from your sight.”
But you heard the voice of my pleas for mercy
    when I cried to you for help.
korean_text: 내가 놀라서 말하기를 주의 목전에서 끊어졌다 하였사오나 내가 주께 부르짖을 때에 주께서 나의 간구하는 소리를 들으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: I had said in my alarm,
“I am cut off from your sight.”
But you heard the voice of my pleas for mercy
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 내가 자비를 구하는 소리를 들으셨고

sentences.original_text: when I cried to you for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 당신께 도움을 청하며 외쳤을 때.
